name: Ethlinq Tech
description: What is the project about? EthlinQ Tech is a Decentralized Liquidity Protocol with LP rewards and token burns mechanism. What makes your project unique? EthlinQ is bringing true decentralization by giving all LP to its holders. History of your project. In the spirit of Satoshi Nakamoto's vision for a peer-to-peer electronic cash system, a new era of crypto innovation unfolds. This project combines the principles of decentralized finance (DeFi) with an innovative transaction tax model to drive a cycle of rewards that fuel ecosystem growth. Just as Bitcoin rewarded miners for securing the network, this project rewards users for holding it tokens and contributing to the system's vitality. Whatâ€™s next for your project? We are developing a Decentralized Liquidity launchpad. What can your token be used for? It is a DeFi token on which users get LP rewards by just holding it in their wallets
